name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Fullstack Engineer with over 10 years of experience in software development, specializing in **C#**, **.NET**, and **APIs**. Demonstrated expertise in building robust applications utilizing **Angular** and adopting Domain-Driven Design principles to enhance software architecture. Proven track record in developing MVPs and POCs that expedite project timelines and facilitate effective stakeholder collaboration through proactive development strategies.
Experienced in delivering high-performance software solutions across various sectors, including healthcare and finance, leveraging a comprehensive tech stack that includes **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, **Flutter**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**.
Skilled in orchestrating cloud-native applications on **Azure** and **AWS**, with a strong background in microservices architecture and event-driven systems. In addition, I possess hands-on experience in CI/CD automation, ensuring the delivery of secure and maintainable solutions that adhere to compliance standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Committed to reducing complexity in software solutions while maximizing impact.
